<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/156809</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>156809</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2837</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Randall's ESL Cyber Listening Lab</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ESL Cyber Randalls Hörendes Labor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Laboratoire D'Écoute de l'ESL Cyber de Randall</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Laboratório Escutando de ESL Cyber De Randall</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Laboratorio Ascoltante di ESL Cyber Del Randall</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εργαστήριο ακούσματος του ESL Cyber Randall</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Laboratorio Que escucha de ESL Cyber De Randall</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An online collection of listening labs for students of ESL, divided into 3 levels of difficulty. Includes interactive tests.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">listening skills</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">recordings</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">comprehension.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Onlineansammlung hörende Labors für die 
Kursteilnehmer ESL, geteilt in 3 Stufen Schwierigkeit. Schließt
interaktive Tests ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une collection en ligne de laboratoires d'écoute 
pour des étudiants d'ESL, divisés en 3 niveaux de difficulté. 
Inclut les essais interactifs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção em linha de laboratórios escutando 
para os estudantes de ESL, divididos em 3 níveis da dificuldade. 
Inclui testes interativos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una collezione in linea di laboratori ascoltanti 
per gli allievi di ESL, divisi in 3 livelli della difficoltà. 
Include le prove interattive.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση συλλογή των εργαστηρίων 
ακούσματος για τους σπουδαστές του ESL, που διαιρούνται σε 3 
επίπεδα δυσκολίας. Περιλαμβάνει τις διαλογικές δοκιμές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una colección en línea de los laboratorios que 
escuchan para los estudiantes de ESL, divididos en 3 niveles de 
dificultad. Incluye pruebas interactivas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">hörende Fähigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufnahmen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfassen.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">qualifications d'écoute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">enregistrements</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">habilidades escutando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gravações</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">abilità ascoltanti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">registrazioni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δεξιότητες ακούσματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καταγραφές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">habilidades que escuchan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">grabaciones</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comprensión.</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
